Interface describing the FiniteStateMachine

Instance Variables hide inherited show inherited

change(default,null) : prime.signals.Signal2<prime.fsm._IFiniteStateMachine.NewState, prime.fsm._IFiniteStateMachine.OldState>

Change dispatcher. First parameter is the new state, the second parameter is the old state.

current(default,null) : IState

Collection of states that the current statemachine can have.

defaultState(default,null) : IState

State that will be used when there is no state set.

Instance Methods hide inherited show inherited

changeTo(toState : IState) : Void -> Void

Enabel the current state group. The group will be allowed to switch from states again when it's enabled.
